titles.title: A resolution designating March 22, 2019, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".
A resolution designating March 22, 2019, as "National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
This resolution designates March 22, 2019, as National Rehabilitation Counselors Appreciation Day.
Additionally, the resolution commends rehabilitation counselors and professional organizations assisting individuals who require rehabilitation.
